scope.description: A selector to match the scope name for completions to be enabled

completions.description: A list of completion objects with trigger and contents. Alternatively a list of plain completion strings.

oneOf.description: A completion string that is at the same time a trigger for that completion

trigger.markdownDescription:
Text that will be displayed in the completions list and will cause the contents to be inserted when chosen.
You can optionally follow it with a tab character (`\t`) and a text to add a hint for the preceding trigger. The hint will be displayed alongside the trigger and does not affect the trigger itself.

contents.markdownDescription:
A text to be inserted when completion is triggered. Supports the same string [interpolation features](https://sublime-text-unofficial-documentation.readthedocs.io/en/latest/extensibility/snippets.html#snippet-features) as snippets.

**Note**: If you want a literal $, you have to escape it like this: `\$`.
